title: PUCSL approves 6.5-hour power cut till Friday
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) has approved the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) request for power cuts of six hours and 30 minutes till 8 April.

The CEB had requested for power cuts for four dates due to limited supply of fuel for thermal power plants, the PUCSL said yesterday. For areas ABCDEFGHIJKL - four hours from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. and 2 hours and 30 minutes from 5 p.m. to 10 p.m.  For areas PQRSTUVW - four hours from 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. and 2 hours and 30 minutes from 6 p.m. to 11 p.m.
For area CC1 - 3 hours and 30 minutes from 6 a.m. to 9.30 a.m.
